name: 2019 The 5th IEEE International Conference on Control, Automation and Robotics (ICCAR 2019)--Ei Compendex & SCOPUS
content: ▼Selected and registered papers will be published by IEEE Conference Publication and indexed by \*Ei Compendex & SCOPUS\*. ▼History of ICCAR: ICCAR 2018, Auckland, New Zealand, April 20-23, 2018\. Publication: IEEE Conference Proceedings Online: https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/tocresult.jsp?isnumber=8384628 ICCAR 2017, Nagaya, Japan, April 22-24, 2017\. Publication: IEEE Conference Proceedings Online: http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/tocresult.jsp?isnumber=7942645 ICCAR 2017 Proceedings has been indexed by EI Compendex and SCOPUS. ICCAR 2016, Hong Kong, April 28-30, 2016\. Publication: IEEE Conference Proceedings Online: http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/tocresult.jsp?isnumber=7486682 ICCAR 2016 Proceedings has been indexed by EI Compendex and SCOPUS. ICCAR 2015, Singapore, May 20-22, 2015\. Publication: IEEE Conference Proceedings Online: http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/mostRecentIssue.jsp?reload=true&punumber=7153096 ICCAR 2015 Proceedings has been indexed by EI Compendex and SCOPUS. ▼Keynote & Plenary Speakers: Prof. Toshio Fukuda, Nagoya University, Japan; Prof. Mo El-Hawary, Dalhousie University, Canada; Prof. Ferial El-Hawary, Dalhousie University, Canada; Prof. Wei-Hsin Liao, The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong.
